allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add Phase 2: Module Execution UI & Session Interaction Panel

Module Execution UI Improvements:
- Add ExecuteModuleModal component with tabbed options \(Basic/Advanced/Evasion\)
- Add payload selection dropdown for exploit modules
- Support execution of auxiliary and post modules
- Add execution state tracking with visual feedback
- Add jobs endpoints for monitoring running jobs

Session Interaction Panel:
- Add SessionTerminal component with xterm.js
- Add real-time session output streaming via WebSocket
- Add command history navigation \(up/down arrows\)
- Add session subscription/unsubscription handlers
- Integrate terminal into Sessions page

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
